Changelog

-----
* Imporoved a behavior of build command, #44
* Added lint command (requires gjslint), #33
* Added option suggestion and completion, #32

* Fixed #45, updated compiler location


0.1.1
-----
* Fixed #36, it didn't work when installed by ``pip``
* Fixed #37, it didn't work on Windows


0.1.0

* Hello, world!
